actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the threshold for the allowance of the deduction for medical expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce from 7.5 to 2.5% the amount of adjusted gross income over which a taxpayer's medical expenses are fully deductible.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the threshold for the allowance of the deduction for medical expenses.
